sos4R: List of SOSs

Daniel Nüst

Institute for Geoinformatics, University of Münster, Germany.
daniel.nuest@uni-muenster.de

2019-05-17

Source: vignettes/sos4R-vignette-99-services.Rmd
sos4R-vignette-99-services.Rmd

A list of SOS instances in production. A listing here does not imply extensive testing with sos4R. Contributions of demos welcome!

Do you know about an SOS instance not on this list? Open an issue or a pull request.

library("sos4R")

NOAA Center for Operational Oceanographic Products and Services (CO-OPS)

ioosdif <- SOS(url = "http://opendap.co-ops.nos.noaa.gov/ioos-dif-sos/SOS",
               binding = "KVP")
ioosdif
#> Object of class SOS_1.0.0 [KVP, http://opendap.co-ops.nos.noaa.gov/ioos-dif-sos/SOS, NOAA.NOS.CO-OPS SOS]
#sosContents(ioosdif)

Integrated Ocean Observing System (IOOS)

More information: https://sdf.ndbc.noaa.gov/sos/

This SOS supports CSV as a response format.

ioos <- SOS(url = "https://sdf.ndbc.noaa.gov/sos/server.php",
              useDCPs = FALSE,
              timeFormat = "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")
ioos.off <- sosOfferings(ioos)
obs <- getObservation(sos = ioos,
                      offering = sosName(ioos.off[[100]]),
                      responseFormat = "text/csv",
                      observedProperty = sosObservedProperties(ioos.off[[100]])[1])
#> Parsed with column specification:
#> cols(
#>   station_id = col_character(),
#>   sensor_id = col_character(),
#>   `latitude (degree)` = col_double(),
#>   `longitude (degree)` = col_double(),
#>   date_time = col_datetime(format = ""),
#>   `depth (m)` = col_double(),
#>   `air_temperature (C)` = col_double()
#> )
obs
#> # A tibble: 1 x 7
#>   station_id sensor_id `latitude (degr… `longitude (deg…
#>   <chr>      <chr>                <dbl>            <dbl>
#> 1 urn:ioos:… urn:ioos…             18.3            -65.0
#> # … with 3 more variables: date_time <dttm>, `depth (m)` <dbl>,
#> #   `air_temperature (C)` <dbl>

NOAA National Data Buoy Center

ndbc <- SOS(url = "https://sdf.ndbc.noaa.gov/sos/server.php",
            binding = "KVP")
ndbc
#> Object of class SOS_1.0.0 [KVP, https://sdf.ndbc.noaa.gov/sos/server.php, National Data Buoy Center SOS]
#sosContents(ndbc)

WSV PegelOnline

About: https://www.pegelonline.wsv.de/gast/start

pegel <- SOS(url = "http://pegelonline.wsv.de/webservices/gis/gdi-sos",
                version = "1.0.0")
pegel
#> Object of class SOS_1.0.0 [POX, http://pegelonline.wsv.de/webservices/gis/gdi-sos, PegelOnline SOS]
sosContents(pegel)
#> Object of class SosContents with observation offerings (names):
#>   SAUERSTOFFGEHALT, WASSERTEMPERATUR_ROHDATEN, ABFLUSS, WINDRICHTUNG, FLIESSGESCHWINDIGKEIT, WASSERSTAND_ROHDATEN, DURCHFAHRTSHOEHE, LUFTFEUCHTE, ABFLUSS_ROHDATEN, CHLORID, WINDGESCHWINDIGKEIT, LUFTTEMPERATUR_ROHDATEN, ELEKTRISCHE_LEITFAEHIGKEIT_ROHDATEN, WASSERTEMPERATUR, LUFTTEMPERATUR, PH-WERT

Axiom Data Science Demo SOS

axiom <- SOS(url = "http://dev.demo.i52nsos.axiomdatascience.com/sos", binding = "KVP")
axiom
#> Object of class SOS_1.0.0 [KVP, http://dev.demo.i52nsos.axiomdatascience.com/sos, IOOS 52N SOS]
sosContents(axiom)
#> Object of class SosContents with observation offerings (names):
#>   urn_ioos_network_test_all, urn_ioos_station_test_0, urn_ioos_station_test_1, urn_ioos_station_test_2, urn_ioos_station_test_3, urn_ioos_station_test_4, urn_ioos_station_test_5, urn_ioos_station_test_6, urn_ioos_station_test_7, urn_ioos_station_test_8, urn_ioos_station_test_9

Belgian Interregional Environment Agency (IRCEL - CELINE)

irceline <- SOS(url = "http://geo.irceline.be/sos/service",
                version = sos200_version)
irceline
#> Object of class SOS_2.0.0 [POX, http://geo.irceline.be/sos/service, IRCEL - CELINE (SOS)]
#sosContents(irceline)

PANGAEA

About: http://sos.dataportals.pangaea.de/

Loch Etive, Scotland; Scottish Association for Marine Science

lochetive <- SOS(url = "http://sos.dataportals.pangaea.de/lochEtive_SOS/sos")
#> Warning in sosConvertTime(xml2::xml_text(x = obj), sos = sos): Error
#> converting string '2011-01-24 11:04:33' with format '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%OS'!
#> Returning 'NA'
#> Warning in sosConvertTime(xml2::xml_text(x = obj), sos = sos): Error
#> converting string '2011-12-04 07:13:32' with format '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%OS'!
#> Returning 'NA'
#> Warning in sosConvertTime(xml2::xml_text(x = obj), sos = sos): Error
#> converting string '2011-01-24 11:15:20' with format '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%OS'!
#> Returning 'NA'
#> Warning in sosConvertTime(xml2::xml_text(x = obj), sos = sos): Error
#> converting string '2011-12-04 07:17:28' with format '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%OS'!
#> Returning 'NA'
lochetive
#> Object of class SOS_1.0.0 [POX, http://sos.dataportals.pangaea.de/lochEtive_SOS/sos, Loch Etive SOS]
sosContents(lochetive)
#> Object of class SosContents with observation offerings (names):
#>   SeaGuard_4430-269, RDCP600-338

Koljoefjord observatory, Sweden; University of Gothenburg

koljoefjord <- SOS(url = "http://sos.dataportals.pangaea.de/koljoefjord_SOS/sos")
#> Warning in sosConvertTime(xml2::xml_text(x = obj), sos = sos): Error

#> %OS'! Returning 'NA'
#> Warning in sosConvertTime(xml2::xml_text(x = obj), sos = sos): Error
#> converting string '2016-01-13 08:42:22+02:00' with format '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:
#> %OS'! Returning 'NA'
#> Warning in sosConvertTime(xml2::xml_text(x = obj), sos = sos): Error
#> converting string '2012-04-20 15:00:00' with format '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%OS'!
#> Returning 'NA'
#> Warning in sosConvertTime(xml2::xml_text(x = obj), sos = sos): Error
#> converting string '2012-06-04 17:00:00' with format '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%OS'!
#> Returning 'NA'
#> Warning in sosConvertTime(xml2::xml_text(x = obj), sos = sos): Error
#> converting string '2011-07-12 13:21:27+02:00' with format '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:
#> %OS'! Returning 'NA'
#> Warning in sosConvertTime(xml2::xml_text(x = obj), sos = sos): Error
#> converting string '2014-04-09 08:10:20+02:00' with format '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:
#> %OS'! Returning 'NA'
koljoefjord
#> Object of class SOS_1.0.0 [POX, http://sos.dataportals.pangaea.de/koljoefjord_SOS/sos, PANGAEA SOS]
sosContents(koljoefjord)
#> Object of class SosContents with observation offerings (names):
#>   SeaGuard_4430-270, SeaGuard_4430-67, RDCP600-594
#summary(koljoefjord)

Marthas Vineyard Coastal Observatory SOS

MVCO_WHOI <- SOS("http://mvcodata.whoi.edu/cgi-bin/sos/oostethys_sos")
#> Warning in FUN(X[[i]], ...): Mandatory element 'time' missing in
#> offering12m-Node
sosContents(MVCO_WHOI)
#> Object of class SosContents with observation offerings (names):
#>   12m-Node

VITO SOS - Antwerp air quality

idea <- SOS(url = "http://sensorweb.vito.be:8080/IDEA_52nSOSv3.2/sos")
sosContents(idea)
#> Object of class SosContents with observation offerings (names):
#>   alix1, alix2, alix3, alix4, alix5, GAUGE_HEIGHT

Wupperverband FLUGSS

About: https://fluggs.wupperverband.de/v2p/web/fluggs

fluggs <- SOS(url = "https://fluggs.wupperverband.de/sos2/service", binding = "KVP",
              version = "2.0.0")
sosContents(fluggs)
#> Object of class SosContents with observation offerings (names):
#>   Zeitreihen_2m_Tiefe, Zeitreihen_Einzelwerte, Zeitreihen_LANUV, Zeitreihen_Oberflaeche, Zeitreihen_Stundensumme, Zeitreihen_Tagesmittelwert_um_17-00_Uhr, Zeitreihen_Tagesmittelwerte, Zeitreihen_Tagessumme

MONALISA

SOS by MONALISA project, operated by eurac research.

About: http://monalisasos.eurac.edu/sos/

monalisa <- SOS(url = "http://monalisasos.eurac.edu/sos/service", binding = "KVP", version = "2.0.0")
sosContents(monalisa)
#> Object of class SosContents with observation offerings (names):
#>   CO2H2O_KalternEddyCov, EDCOV_KalternEddyCov, Meteo_Algund2, Meteo_Girlan1Lamm, Meteo_Gries2NeufeldGreifensteinerweg, Meteo_Lana6, Meteo_Nals2OberauCarli, Meteo_NeumarktStiermoos, Meteo_Terlan3, Meteo_Terlan3a, Meteo_Tramin13er, Meteo_Unterrain2FuchsangerEppan, NDVI_KalternEddyCov, NDVI_domef1500, NDVI_domef2000, NDVI_nemef1500, NDVI_nemef2000, NDVI_vimef2000, NDVI_vimes1500, PAR_KalternEddyCov, PAR_domef1500, PAR_domef2000, PAR_domes1500, PAR_domes2000, PAR_dopas2000, PAR_nemef1500, PAR_nemef2000, PAR_nemes1500, PAR_nemes2000, PAR_nepas2000, PAR_vimef1500, PAR_vimef2000, PAR_vimes1500, PAR_vimes2000, PAR_vipas2000, PREC_KalternEddyCov, PRI_KalternEddyCov, PRI_domef1500, PRI_domef2000, PRI_nemef1500, PRI_nemef2000, PRI_vimef2000, PRI_vimes1500, SH_KalternEddyCov, ST_Algund2, ST_Eppanberg, ST_Eppanberg_matrix, ST_Girlan1Lamm, ST_Gries2NeufeldGreifensteinerweg, ST_Kaltern, ST_Kaltern_matrix, ST_Laimburg, ST_Lana6, ST_Nals2OberauCarli, ST_NeumarktStiermoos, ST_StPaulsFeld, ST_StPaulsFeld_matrix, ST_Terlan3, ST_Terlan3a, ST_Tramin13er, ST_Unterrain2FuchsangerEppan, ST_domef1500, ST_domef2000, ST_domes1500, ST_domes2000, ST_dopas2000, ST_nemef1500, ST_nemef2000, ST_nemes1500, ST_nemes2000, ST_nepas2000, ST_vimef1500, ST_vimef2000, ST_vimes1500, ST_vimes2000, ST_vipas2000, SWC_Algund2, SWC_Eppanberg, SWC_Girlan1Lamm, SWC_Gries2NeufeldGreifensteinerweg, SWC_Kaltern, SWC_KalternEddyCov, SWC_Laimburg, SWC_Lana6, SWC_Nals2OberauCarli, SWC_NeumarktStiermoos, SWC_StPaulsFeld, SWC_Terlan3, SWC_Terlan3a, SWC_Tramin13er, SWC_Unterrain2FuchsangerEppan, SWC_domef1500, SWC_domef2000, SWC_domes1500, SWC_domes2000, SWC_dopas2000, SWC_nemef1500, SWC_nemef2000, SWC_nemes1500, SWC_nemes2000, SWC_nepas2000, SWC_vimef1500, SWC_vimef2000, SWC_vimes1500, SWC_vimes2000, SWC_vipas2000, SWP_Eppanberg, SWP_Kaltern, SWP_StPaulsFeld, TEMPHUM_KalternEddyCov, WIND_KalternEddyCov, WR_KalternEddyCov, daily_LaimburgProvince, min10_LaimburgProvince, min5_LaimburgProvince

NIWA

Two SOS by New Zealands National Institute of Water and Atmospheric Research (NIWA) for hydrometric and climate data, see https://teamwork.niwa.co.nz/display/NEDA/Access+to+Sensor+Data.

niwaHydro <- SOS(url = "https://hydro-sos.niwa.co.nz/",
                  binding = "POX", useDCPs = FALSE,
                  #binding = "KVP",
                  version = "2.0.0")
sosContents(niwaHydro)
#> Object of class SosContents with observation offerings (names):
#>   HG.Master@15341, HG.Master@15514, HG.Master@16501, HG.Master@16502, HG.Master@19716, HG.Master@19734, HG.Master@23005, HG.Master@23104, HG.Master@23106, HG.Master@23150, HG.Master@29808, HG.Master@33117, HG.Master@3722, HG.Master@39508, HG.Master@40810, HG.Master@43602, HG.Master@47804, HG.Master@52003, HG.Master@57009, HG.Master@58902, HG.Master@60114, HG.Master@62103, HG.Master@62105, HG.Master@64610, HG.Master@65104, HG.Master@66405, HG.Master@68001, HG.Master@68526, HG.Master@71103, HG.Master@75207, HG.Master@86802, HG.Master@90612, HG.Master@91401, HG.Master@91403, HG.Master@93202, HG.Master@93203, HG.Master@95102, PH.NRWQN@DN5, QR.Master@15341, QR.Master@15514, QR.Master@16501, QR.Master@16502, QR.Master@19716, QR.Master@19734, QR.Master@23005, QR.Master@23104, QR.Master@23106, QR.Master@23150, QR.Master@29808, QR.Master@33117, QR.Master@3722, QR.Master@39508, QR.Master@40810, QR.Master@43602, QR.Master@47804, QR.Master@52003, QR.Master@57009, QR.Master@58902, QR.Master@60114, QR.Master@62103, QR.Master@62105, QR.Master@64610, QR.Master@65104, QR.Master@66405, QR.Master@68001, QR.Master@68526, QR.Master@71103, QR.Master@75207, QR.Master@86802, QR.Master@90612, QR.Master@91401, QR.Master@91403, QR.Master@93202, QR.Master@93203, QR.Master@95102
#sosResponseFormats(niwaHydro)
discharge29808 <- getObservation(sos = niwaHydro,
                                 observedProperty = list("Discharge"), # phenomena
                                 featureOfInterest = list("29808"), # sites
                                 #saveOriginal = "../tests/responses/hydro-sos.niwa.co.nz_Discharge_29808.xml",
                                 #responseFormat = "http://www.opengis.net/waterml/2.0",
                                 #inspect = TRUE,
                                 retrieveFOI = FALSE)
sosResult(discharge29808)
#>      m^3/s
#> 1 3.693452
# service offline - HTTP 503
#niwaClimate <- SOS(url = "http://clidb-sos.niwa.co.nz/sos/kvp", binding = "KVP", useDCPs = FALSE, version = "2.0.0")
#sosContents(niwaClimate)
